todos.title: Values Test
todos.body: Your core values should pass the following five part test, 1. Is the value unique to your organization and distinguished (striving for 'integrity' is not unique), 2. Are you obsessed with the value, 3. Will the value outlive us, 4. Would we sacrifice money to protect it, 5. Can we actually 'live' it every day.

todos.title: Don't Go Chasing Waterfalls
todos.body: Stick to what you are good at.

todos.title: Trust
todos.body: Managers should trust their team and not micromanage.

todos.title: Simplify
todos.body: Managers should strive to simplify everything.

todos.title: Live Values
todos.body: Managers should live and reinforce your values.

todos.title: Give Opportunity to Leave
todos.body: Managers should let employees know that if they don't want to be here, they have their back and will help them exit successfully.

todos.title: Balance
todos.body: Managers should help team find balance and not glorify overtime.

todos.title: Better Way
todos.body: Managers should encourage everyone to find a better way, not their way.

todos.title: Make Decisions
todos.body: Managers should be the ones not afraid to step in and make the decisions.

todos.title: Vulnerability
todos.body: Managers should be the first to become vulnerable.

todos.title: LMA
todos.body: Managers should be able to lead, manage, and hold accountable.

todos.title: Servant Leaders
todos.body: Managers serve the team, the team doesn't serve them. Flip the accountability chart.

todos.title: Be Heard
todos.body: Manager should encourage everyone to be heard and to add issues and opportunities to team meetings.

todos.title: Fewer is better
todos.body: Fewer core values and goals is better.

todos.title: No assholes allowed rule
todos.body: Don't allow someone that is toxic too be a part of your environment.  It doesn't matter how skilled they are.

todos.title: Breakdown Goals
todos.body: Big hairy audacious goals are achieved by breaking them down into smaller easily accomplished goals.

todos.title: Know Your Big Hairy Goals
todos.body: Be able to defend your big goals by showing a plan on how you will achieve those goals.
